lead_paragraph: The Atlanta Braves and Miami Marlins will play on the U.S. military base at Fort Bragg, North Carolina, on July 3 in a 12,500-capacity ballpark to be built with funding by Major League Baseball and the players' association.

headline.main: Marlins-Braves Game on July 3 Moved to Fort Bragg, NC
headline.print_headline: Marlins-Braves Game on July 3 Moved to Fort Bragg, NC

snippet: The Atlanta Braves and Miami Marlins will play on the U.S. military base at Fort Bragg, North Carolina, on July 3 in a 12,500-capacity ballpark to be built with funding by Major League Baseball and the players' association.
